name: Sidearm Shootout
description:
Welcome to the world of Sidearm Shootout; a world where a bacterial infection has swept the globe; a world where one gunshot can cause crowds of the undead. Trek across the valley in search of sanctuary to hide out from the zombies.

This game took me 2 weeks to make :) All feedback is appreciated but keep in mind I am a small developer and I made all the player models and animations. Thank you for downloading and I hope you enjoy it :D

Warning: Low end systems may not run the game well, I assure you, your PC didn't crash - it's just the fact that I forgot to put in loading screens before the deadline. I recommend medium or low graphics settings for the best loading times

Enjoy :D
